entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
